sage.scene.shape

Class Line

  • java.lang.Object
    • sage.scene.SceneNode
      • sage.scene.Leaf
        • sage.scene.shape.Line

  • public class Line
extends Leaf
    Line defines an object which is a line between two 3D points. Note that unlike most shapes in sage.scene.shape, a Line has no BoundingVolume attached to it by default.
    Author:
    John Clevenger

    • Constructor Detail

      • Line

        public Line()
        Constructs a Line with a default name and with null begin and end points, null color, and zero thickness. Note that it is not very useful to construct a line with no end points; this constructor is intended for internal use only.

      • Line

        public Line(graphicslib3D.Point3D p0,
            graphicslib3D.Point3D p1,
            java.awt.Color color,
            int thickness)
        Constructs a Line with characteristics as specified by the input parameters, which are passed to constructor Line(String,Point3D,Point3D,Color,int) along with a default name.

      • Line

        public Line(java.lang.String name,
            graphicslib3D.Point3D p0,
            graphicslib3D.Point3D p1,
            java.awt.Color color,
            int thickness)
        Constructs a Line with the specified name between the specified points with the specified Color and thickness (line width).
        Parameters:
        name - - the name of this SceneNode
        p0 - - the start point of the line
        p1 - - the end point of the line
        color - - the Color of the line
        thickness - - the thickness of the line, in pixels

      • updateLocalBound

        public void updateLocalBound()
        Description copied from class: Leaf
        updateLocalBound() computes a new local bounding volume for this Leaf by re-examining the vertex data for the leaf. This method is specified by this class (and also by the parent SceneNode class) but must be implemented by any derived classes since the abstract Leaf class can't know what the subclass data looks like (and hence can't know how to compute the bounding volume).
        Specified by:
        updateLocalBound in class Leaf
